title: GIONEE Max (Royal Blue, 32 GB)  (2 GB RAM)

product_specification.In The Box: Handset, Battery, Charger, USB Cable, Screen Guard, Warranty Card, User Manual
product_specification.Operating Frequency: 2G: B3/B8, 3G: B1/B8, 4G LTE FDD: B1/B3/B5/B8, 4G LTE TDD: B38/B40/B41
product_specification.Primary Camera Features: 13MP + Bokeh Lens Dual Rear Camera, Night mode, Beauty Mode, Time lapse, Slow Motion Video
product_specification.Other Features: Face Unlock, Notification Light, Screen Mirror/Cast
product_specification.Warranty Summary: One Year for Handset, 6 Months for Accessories

product_description.Stunning Visuals: This Gionee smartphone’s 15.46 cm (6.1) HD+ Full View Dewdrop Display enriches your favourite video content with life, making it look more immersive.
product_description.Power-packed Battery: Need a battery that’ll last you for days? Well, this smartphone’s 5000-mAh battery offers you a standby time of about 28 days (2G Network) on a single full charge. It offers you about 24 hours of music, 9 hours of movie-watching, and around 42 hours of call time, among other things.
product_description.Sleek and Curved Finish: Its 2.5D curved glass and sleek design give it a finish that feels amazingly smooth in your hands, and it gives others a reason to stop and take a look at it.
product_description.Blazing-fast Processor: This handset’s 1.6-GHz octa-core processor and up to 2 GB of RAM facilitate powerful smartphone performance, helping you multitask with sheer ease. It also has about 32 GB of ROM (expandable up to 256 GB), which you can take advantage of to store all your essential applications, pictures, songs, and other files.
product_description.Reverse-charging Technology: Thanks to this technology, you can use this Gionee smartphone as a portable charger to recharge other compatible smart devices.
product_description.Amazing Cameras: This smartphone features a dual rear-camera set-up (13 MP + Bokeh Lens) and a 5-megapixel front camera that let you take equally incredible pictures as well as selfies. Apart from that, you always enjoy really cool camera modes, such as Slow-motion, HRD Mode, and Time Lapse, among others.
product_description.Dual SIM and Micro SD Slot: You can use this slot for another SIM card or to expand the storage capacity up to 256 GB.
product_description.Face Unlock: Using this feature, you can unlock this smartphone by simply scanning your face. Not only does it make your phone secure, but also makes it convenient for you to access its content.
product_description.Durable and Powerful: This handset has been tested over 3000 times to ensure that it is long-lasting as well as a strong performer.

It is a detailed review of this budget
smartphone.
CONS-
SECURITY-
There is a big security issue in this budget smartphones as you can see in above images the system apps like gallery,music player, sound recorder are asking permission to make and manage phone calls and without the permission the app doesn't work, what's the need of permission to manage phone calls in this basic apps, company should seriously roll out a update to fix this.
Dual volte-
dual volte does not work in any sim you can use volte only in one sim at a time as you can see in above image.
Notification led-
This phone does not have notification led it is shown as it have notification led in description of product on flipkart.
Battery backup-
Battery backup is average it only lasts half day on minimum usage and it takes 3 and a half-hour to charge up full
Pros-
Grip is awesome in this smartphone it is very easy to carry along.
It has many features such as double tap to wake,sleep
Flip to mute alarm,phone
Put your ear towards phone to accept phone call or put your ear towards phone to go to handset mode from speaker mode
Pick up phone to wake the screen
Net speed-
Net speed and network is best in this device.
The only big issue in this device is security.
Best affordable smart phone for low budget, with a lot of features. I ordered this for my dad, but I would like to have this one for my own.. 😇

Good for daily use as a secondary phone.
HD IPS display in this price range best supports Youtube video upto 1080p and 720p50fps.
As battery mentioned 5000mah but not upto mark compare to Samsung phones 500mah Battery charging takes upto 3hrs full charge from 0-100%.
overall performance good 24gb user available.

only secondary dual 4g active sims works and daily normal tasks works fine.
overall 10 out of 8.
after a month use review.

Frankly speaking it is one of the most best budget phone with best of specifications and display and basic functionality at this price point. You can get this features on other phones as well but certainly not at this price. It is can be used for rough and tough purpose an extensive daily uses if you want to keep a second phone.really I do not have much idea about any phone specification and their speed at this price point but I do certainly feel it is really more then what the prices set at. If you are expecting something best within 5000 or 5500 just close your eyes and buy it.
The display is as good as amoled display at this price point. My experience and review is unbiased as I am already using Google pixel 4A and iPhone and iPad pro but at the same time I wanted to to gift my mother in law a budget and a very user friendly phone with big battery but after buying it I was amazed to find that my past Motorola G7 phone and Motorola E4 Plus looks nowhere near it both in functions in speed and price. I liked it so much that I purchased another one for my driver also.
So here is my final outcome and verdict.

The phone working speed is as good as any 10 to 15 thousand priced phone at least far better than G7 Motorola which I purchased last year for 17000 ke but still lags than Gionee Max.
It has a wonderful and speedy face unlock feature which my pixel 4A and even Motorola G7 do not have it.
And not to talk about the battery which is the best part it's a battery beast.
I would give four out of five in camera quality which I am still testing but feel like the pictures are very original real like. And if you can get this phone with cashback on cards it will be extra treat to your pocket also.
And lastly and not the least it is is made in India product.

Firstly thank you Flipkart for delivering the order in just 2 days and providing me this mobile in very good price with all your offers.
Gionee is a good brand and it's mobile last long if you are a good user. I am personally using Gionee M2 as my secondary device from past 5.5 years.
Gionee max is a very good mid ranger phone and it has a good user interface. It suits best for average to mid range user. The only issue I observed in the mobile that it gets warm and the battery gets drain fast if you do multi-tasking on it. Rest everything is fine for me in this mobile.

Reviewing after using more than a week.
As per princing rs4999 you cannot get such standard mobile.
No such hanging or slow down during usage..It is not ment for heavy task or gaming.Day to day usage will be perfect.But surprising it can play PUBG,ASPHALT,CALL OF DUTY and many more games.in medium or low settings.But recommend not to overload with heavy task.
It alwyas use 1.5gb of ram avg out of 2gb.Internal storage you get only 26gb around. Rear camera is good in day light.. but surprisngly not to bad in artificial lighting.. it has HDR & NIGHT modes.
Hand feel of this mobile is not such cheap feel..
You will ever never feel that the mobile is of rs4999.
Battery stay almost 1day in heavy usage.. Normal usage it stays 2days.
Lastly I will say I just astonished how gionee is providing it at rs4999.Many other brands with less specs with more pricing they are proving.
One thing I like to share what I noticed there is software issue..e.g one alarm sign alwyas shows at top bar beside battery percentage.As I didnt put any Alarm but sing or notification is showing.It is a glitch.
No scuch Ads comes.only one gn_notifiction always comes...I didnt found any solution to stop the notification.No such blotware..or useless apps..You can unistall or disable apps.
One good feature is that you can use the SD CARD as internal storage.where you can expand the storage also can install apps.

Pros and Cons
Pros
1. Great display fantastic for content viewing
2. Decent battery backup.
3. Face unlock is quite accurate
Cons
1. Bloatwares that cannot be uninstalled. Especially Gionee Push that continously keeps on pushing notifications. Given the spying scandal that Gionee found itself in, more transparency should have been provided.
2. RAM insufficient, phone hangs everytime. Android go should have been given, instead full Android 10 is provided which is difficult to run in only 2 gb ram. A 3 gb variant should have been provided.
3. Charger is underpowered, phone takes over 3 hours to charge.
4. Device gets heated while watching online content such as Netflix/Amazon Prime.
5. Warranty issues as the phone is actually manufactured by Karbonn and Gionee refuses to provide warranty.

11. It's a "Made in India" product
